# Rebrand Template To A New Brand

This issue template provides a comprehensive checklist for rebranding this template for a new nonprofit organization. Complete ALL sections below to ensure a successful rebrand.

---

## ‚ö†Ô∏è IMPORTANT: Complete GitHub Web UI Settings FIRST

**These settings MUST be configured through GitHub's web interface BEFORE any code changes can be made by Copilot or automated tools.**

### GitHub Repository Settings (Web UI Only)

#### 1. General Settings

- [ ] Repository name: `___________________`
- [ ] Repository description: `___________________`
- [ ] Repository topics (comma-separated): `___________________`

#### 2. GitHub Pages Configuration

- [ ] Source: Deploy from a branch ‚Üí `gh-pages` ‚Üí `/ (root)`
- [ ] Custom domain (if applicable): `___________________`
- [ ] Enforce HTTPS: ‚òê Yes ‚òê No

#### 3. Actions Permissions

- [ ] Set "Workflow permissions" to "Read and write permissions"
- [ ] Enable "Allow GitHub Actions to create and approve pull requests"

#### 4. Security & Analysis

- [ ] Enable Dependency graph
- [ ] Enable Dependabot alerts
- [ ] Enable Dependabot security updates
- [ ] Enable Code scanning (CodeQL)
- [ ] Enable Secret scanning (if available)

#### 5. Branch Protection Rules

Create ruleset named "Protect Main" with:

- [ ] Restrict deletions
- [ ] Require pull request before merging
- [ ] Require status checks to pass (select: Test and Build, Analyze)
- [ ] Require signed commits
- [ ] Block force pushes

#### 6. Secrets Configuration (Optional)

- [ ] Add `LHCI_GITHUB_APP_TOKEN` for Lighthouse CI (fine-grained token with pull requests: write)

---

## üîß Technical Configuration

### GitHub Actions Workflow Configuration

**Repository Name for basePath:** `___________________`
(This will be used in `.github/workflows/deploy.yml` and `.github/workflows/lighthouse.yml`)

**Using Custom Domain?**

- ‚òê Yes - basePath should be removed from workflows
- ‚òê No - basePath should be `/[repository-name]`

**GitHub Usernames for Code Owners:** (comma-separated)
`@___________________, @___________________, @___________________`

## ‚úÖ Pre-Submission Checklist

Before submitting this issue, verify you have:

- [ ] Completed ALL organization information fields
- [ ] Provided contact information for all board members
- [ ] Included LinkedIn profile URLs for all board members
- [ ] Attached logo files (SVG and ICO) or provided download links
- [ ] Specified brand color hex codes
- [ ] Written organization mission statement
- [ ] Created at least 3 FAQs
- [ ] Included at least 3 testimonials
- [ ] Specified repository name for basePath configuration
- [ ] Listed all CODEOWNERS GitHub usernames
- [ ] Completed GitHub Web UI settings (repository settings, Actions permissions, branch protection)

---

## ü§ñ Automation Notes

**After submitting this issue with complete information:**

1. GitHub Copilot or automated scripts can perform the following tasks:
   - Update all text references (organization name, EIN, domain, contact info)
   - Update workflow basePath configuration
   - Update CODEOWNERS file
   - Update social media links
   - Update team member data files
   - Update FAQ data files
   - Update testimonial data files

2. Manual tasks that will still be required:
   - Replace logo and favicon files in `/public` directory
   - Add team member photos to `/public/team/` directory
   - Review and adjust color scheme in CSS files
   - Test all changes locally before deployment

3. Estimated time for automated rebrand: 10-15 minutes
4. Estimated time for manual tasks: 30-60 minutes
5. **Total estimated rebrand time: 1-2 hours** (vs. 8-12 hours manual)

---

## üìû Need Help?

If you have questions about completing this template:

- Review [TEMPLATE_USAGE.md](../TEMPLATE_USAGE.md) for detailed setup instructions
- Review [TEMPLATE_SETUP_CHECKLIST.md](../TEMPLATE_SETUP_CHECKLIST.md) for a quick reference
- Check [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md) for contribution guidelines
- Open a discussion in the repository's Discussions tab

---

**DO NOT SUBMIT THIS ISSUE UNTIL ALL REQUIRED INFORMATION IS PROVIDED.**

Missing information will delay the rebrand process and may require multiple back-and-forth communications.
